amendment.description: Amendment extends the nondischargeability of student loans to loans extended by private lenders with certain exceptions made for undue hardships.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the discharge of all qualified education loans, rather than just federally made, guaranteed or insured education loans, and to include an exception for undue hardships.

action.text: Graham amendment (A005) modified by unanimous consent. The amendment offered by Mr. Graham was modified to make technical changes.
On agreeing to the Graham amendment (A005) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
